titles.title: Come, let us join our cheerful songs

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Come, let us join our cheerful songs, And thus approach the throne; Had we ten thousand thousand tongues, Our theme of joy’s but one:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: “Worthy the Lamb that’s gone on high, To be exalted thus!” “Worthy the Lamb that died!” we cry, “For He was slain for us.”

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus is worthy to receive Honor and pow’r divine; And blessings more than we can give Be, Lord, forever Thine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Let all that dwell above the sky, And air, and earth, and seas, Conspire to lift thy glories high, And speak thine endless praise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: The whole creation joins in one To bless the sacred name Of him that sits upon the throne, And to adore the Lamb.
